model1_gsw <- lmer(stomatal_conductance ~ ambient_light_intensity + time_hours +
                     1|genotype, data = phys)

Error: number of observations (=235) <= number of random effects (=342) for term (ambient_light_intensity + time_hours + 1 | genotype); the random-effects parameters and the residual variance (or scale parameter) are probably unidentifiable
